titles.title: Sheltered Workshop Employment Amendment of 1987
A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to exclude income received by handicapped and disabled individuals from employment in sheltered workshop.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 2/4/1987--Introduced. Sheltered Workshop Employment Amendment of 1987 - Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to exclude from income for food stamp program purposes earnings received by handicapped or disabled persons in sheltered workshops.
